page.title: 17RECREATION FORRES WEST
page.content: Recreation in our block is quite varied. {Fishing}is a popular sport on the{River Findhorn. }There are main spots to fish in, the Moy and the River Findhorn. Both require a permit. There is also a small burn running through Forres called the Mosset which does not require a permit. There are other activities such as{country dancing}and{indoor } {bowling.} For the girls there are Guides and for the boys there are Cubs and Scouts, many people enjoy the swimming facillities. There is also Bingo in the Hall. There are many play parks for the younger children. There are also some football pitches for people to play on.
